162472ef-2169-4ca5-a6c4-e7f402d0ab2b.description: Earners of the Healthcare Analytics Certificate have gained foundational skills necessary for business and data analyst roles in the healthcare industry. These skills include business analytics fundamentals, SQL, and data visualization with Tableau. They are able to complete exploratory data analysis projects, run MySQL queries using the data manipulation language (DML) and data definition language (DDL), and create data Stories and visualizations in Tableau.
